summary: A comprehensive pytest-based test suite that exercises the Security Account Manager Remote (SAMR) protocol implementation, covering connection handling, domain object manipulation, creation and deletion of users, groups, and aliases, enumeration of accounts, membership management, password changes, and security/account information queries.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the SAMR protocol features in the Impacket library, preventing regressions and ensuring compliance with expected Windows SAMR behavior.
